name: Marble Maze (Hah-Young)
description:
Marble Maze with 3 levels with increasing difficulty

Instructions:

  • use WASD to move the marble through various obstacles!
  • Get the marble to the final diamond gate!

Level 1: GrassLand

  • Get used to the player controls by knocking down the ramp to advance to the platform with the gate
  • Tip: Don’t go too fast after you lower the platform or you’ll fall off!

Level 2: IceLand

  • Simple maze with low walls to make it easier to see the entire map
  • Tip: Keep an eye out for the glowing gate so you don’t get lost!

Level 3: DreamLand

  • A more complicated maze with the entire platform tilted. The walls are higher and the camera is zoomed in, making it difficult for the player to navigate through the maze
  • Tip: Move as soon as you start or else you’ll fall off the platform! The entire platform is tilted, with higher walls, and a more zoomed in camera which will make it harder to navigate

All of the textures were found off of google images!
